title: Quick Tab Manager UI Patterns
details: Quick Tabs Manager sidebar displays tabs with metadata including position. Format: "800Ã—600 at (250, 150)". Button colors: restore button uses green (#4caf50), close button uses light gray (#999) turning red on hover. CSS data-action selectors are used for button styling: [data-action="restore"] and [data-action="close"]. Position display uses _formatSizePosition helper function in quick-tabs-manager.js.
